SELECT st.id, st.student_id, st.student_name, st.start_time, st. DAY, st.created_time,
IF ( ht.END_TIME_ IS NULL, '未审批', '已审批' ) AS STATUS FROM sys_task st LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst hp ON hp.PROC_INST_ID_ = st.pro_inst_id LEFT JOIN act_hi_taskinst ht ON ht.PROC_INST_ID_ = st.pro_inst_id WHERE st.pro_inst_id = hp.PROC_INST_ID_ AND ht.NAME_ = '教务处' AND st.pro_inst_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT (ht.PROC_INST_ID_) FROM act_hi_taskinst ht LEFT JOIN act_hi_varinst hv ON ht.PROC_INST_ID_ = hv.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE ( hv.NAME_ = 'leaderId' AND hv.LONG_ = #{leaderId} ) OR ht.NAME_ = '教务处' ) ORDER BY st.id DESC
